data: On the wide south porch of the house where he had been born, Rawley King sat smoking his pipe in the dusk heavy with the scent of a thousand roses.
The eagle's wing: A story of the Colorado
Bower, B. M., 1871-1940; Johnson, Frank Tenney, 1874-1939 [Illustrator]
